cancel_verification_question: If you cancel, your progress will be lost. You can restart later from scratch.
break_verification_session: Canceling now will stop the verification process. You can start it again later. Are you sure you want to cancel?
need_document_backside: Please take a photo of the back side of your document
verification_cancelled_text: Your verification process has been aborted, and all submitted data has been deleted.
take_photo_of_the_back_side: Take a photo of the back side
make_sure_all_details_are_clearly_visibl: Make sure all details are clearly visible
turn_head_side_to_side: Turn your head slowly from side to side
verification_progress: Please wait a couple of seconds while we finalise your application
verification_success: Your identity has been successfully verified
close_tab_continue: You can close this tab to continue
to_continue: To continue work you will be redirected to the main application in few seconds
have_valid_document: Have a valid government-issued document ready
have_utility_bill: Have an utility bill or bank statement not older than 3 months
ensure_you_are_in_welllit_area: Ensure you are in a well-lit area
check_doc_and_liveness: Be prepared to take photos of your document and a selfie
check_doc_liveness_and_utility_bill: Be prepared to take photos of your document, a selfie and a photo of your utility bill
take_photos_of_utility_bill: Be prepared to take a photo of your utility bill
take_selfie: Be prepared to take a selfie
consens_terms_agree_full: I agree to the <privacyLink>Privacy Notice</privacyLink> and <termsLink>Terms of Use</termsLink>
please_wait_subtitle: Please wait a couple of seconds while we finalise your application
photo_clearly_visible: Make sure the photo is clear and all edges are visible
take_photo_of_documemt: Take a photo of your document
please_provide_utility_bill: Please provide an utility bill or bank statement not older than 3 months
utility_bill_requirements: The document should clearly show your full name and current address
take_photo_of_utility_bill: Take a Photo of Your Utility Bill
utility_verification_failed: We couldn't process your utility bill. Please try again with a clearer image.
please_reinitialize_kyc: For security reasons, please refresh the page to continue or restart your verification process.
unknown_error_desc:
We're already working on it.
Please try again later.
session_expired_desc:
Please return to the main application and restart the verification process.
Or refresh page.
session_not_exists_desc:
Please return to the main application and restart the verification process.
Or refresh page.
session_accepted_bun_invalid_desc:
Verification passed, but session is expired.
Please return to the main application and check the status.
session_canceled_desc:
Your verification process has been aborted.
Please return to the main application and check the status.
session_declained_desc:
Your verification process has been declined.
Please return to the main application and check the status.
fit_face_into_oval: Please fit your face into the oval
good: Good job! Slowly turn your head left and right
selfie_failed_subtitle_critical: Please go back and try again
selfie_cancel_subtitle: You can close this tab and return back to the main application
place_face_inside_oval: Place your face inside the oval and follow the instructions until the oval turns green
selfie_done_subtitle_embedded: Now you can go back and continue generate avatar
similarity_failed: Similarity check failed. Please try again
selfie_done_subtitle: Now you can close this tab and return back to the main application
